metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36223 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was discovered in OpenLDAP before 2.4.57 leading to a slapd crash in the Values Return Filter control handling, resulting in denial of service (double free and out-of-bounds read).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36223` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldap-utils - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.9
libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.9
libldap-common - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.9
slapd - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.9
slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openldap package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.45+dfsg-1ubuntu1.9').
